definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: B:Yes.I am going to work in a new firm.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我閽要在一家新公司工作。

sentences.english: What are you doing? —I am looking for my ruler.
sentences.chinese: 椖閽詬墒裁矗織我正在找尺子。

sentences.english: Yes. I am going to work in a new firm.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我閽要在一家新公司工作。

definition: ice spud (aka ice chisel) with a pointy tip/to break a hole in ice (for ice fishing etc) using an ice spud
ancient unit of weight equal to 20 or 24 liang 兩|两[liang3]
door to women's room/gate to palace
